# AVAuthorizationStatus.restricted

**Case**

A status that indicates the app isn’t permitted to use media capture devices.

## Declaration

```swift
case restricted
```

## Discussion

This status occurs when a user can’t change the authorization status, possibly due to the system imposing restrictions like parental controls.

## Status values

- **AVAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: A status that indicates the user hasn’t yet granted or denied authorization.
- **AVAuthorizationStatus.denied**: A status that indicates the user has explicitly denied an app permission to capture media.
- **AVAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: A status that indicates the user has explicitly granted an app permission to capture media.
